owl:Ontology.dc:title: Timebank Ontology
owl:Ontology.terms:creator: Ankit Tibrewal
Subhayan Roy
Tobias Grubenmann
Xueer Li
owl:Ontology.terms:rights: Copyright Â© 2019 The University of Hong Kong
owl:Ontology.rdfs:comment: An ontology to describe poeple and requests for timebanks. This includes the poeple's skills, limitations, and environment.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates that a user who is willing to help accepted the request.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: accepts

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates that a time-interval is repeating until this time and date.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: end repeating on

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property is used to describe that a request exludes helpers having a certain limitation.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: excludes user by limitation

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property is used to describe that a certain limitation excludes certain helpers from the request.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: excludes user from

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The accredited duration of the request. This is the amount of time which will be transferred from the originator the the assigned helper of the request. Do not use this property to indicate the estimated duration of the task. Use hasExpectedDuration instead.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has accredited duration

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates the address of a person or request. The address is specified as a vcard.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has address

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The environment of a user or request. The environment of a request describes specific environmental factors of a request. The environment of a user can be used to infer environmental factors of a request if the user is the originator of the request. However, not all environmental factors of a user might apply to its request, especially if the location of the request differs from the users location.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has environment

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The expected duration indicates the duraction of the request estimated by the originator of the request. Do not use this property to assert the actual time credits associated to this request. Use hasAccreditedDuration instead.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has expected duration

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates that a Timebank user suffers from a certain limitation.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has limitation

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates that the request has the specific originator.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has originator

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates the severity of a limitation.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has severity

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Describes the Skill of a certain Timebank user.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has skill

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Describes the proficiency level of a skill.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has skill level

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Every request can have at most one status assigned to it.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has status

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates the current time-balance of a Timebank user.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has time-balance

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates the time window in which the request can/should be completed.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has time window

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates the time and date when the Timebank request was accepted by the assigned helper.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is acceptance date of

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates that a request is accepted by a user who is willing to help completing the request.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is accepted by

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates the time and date when the Timebank request was accepted by the assigned helper.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is accepted on

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The accredited duration of the request. This is the amount of time which will be transferred from the originator the the assigned helper of the request. Do not use this property to indicate the estimated duration of the task. Use hasExpectedDuration instead.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is accredited to

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates the address of a person or request. The address is specified as a vcard.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is address of

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates the availability of a Timebank user to act as a helper for a Timebank request.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is availability of

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates the availability of a Timebank user to act as a helper for a Timebank request.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is available on

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates the time and date of the completion of a Timebank request.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is completed on

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates the time and date of the completion of a Timebank request.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is completion date of

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The environment of a user or request. The environment of a request describes specific environmental factors of a request. The environment of a user can be used to infer environmental factors of a request if the user is the originator of the request. However, not all environmental factors of a user might apply to its request, especially if the location of the request differs from the users location.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is environment of

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The expected duration indicates the duraction of the request estimated by the originator of the request. Do not use this property to assert the actual time credits associated to this request. Use hasAccreditedDuration instead.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is expected duration of

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates that a certain limitation applies to the Timebank user.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is limitation of

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates that the user is the originator of the request.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is originator of

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates the time and date of the publication of a Timebank request.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is publication date of

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates the time and date of the publication of a Timebank request.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is published on

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates that a specific time and date marks the end of a repetition of a time-interval.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is repeating endpoint of

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates that a time interval repeats on the specified weekdays.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is repetition date of

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The skill associated with a Timebank request.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is required by

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates the severity of a limitation.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is severity of

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Describes the proficiency level of a skill.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is skill level of

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Describes the Skill of a certain Timebank user.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is skill of

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Every request can have at most one status assigned to it.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is status of

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates the current time-balance of a Timebank user.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is time-balance of

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates the time window in which the request can/should be completed.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is time window of

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates that a time interval repeats on the specified weekdays.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: repeats on

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The skill associated with a Timebank request.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: requires skill

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The rating given by the originator of a request to the assigned helper for completing the specific request.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: rating

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The rating given by the originator of a request to the assigned helper for completing the specific request. Ratings can be a decimal in the range of 1 (star) and 5 (stars).
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: rating: 1 to 5

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Seven individual members of :DayOfWeek are included in the ontology, corresponding to the seven days used in the Gregorian calendar, and using the English names :Sunday, :Monday, :Tuesday, :Wednesday, :Thursday, :Friday, :Saturday.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Day of week

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Description of temporal extent structured with separate values for the various elements of a calendar-clock system. The temporal reference system is fixed to Gregorian Calendar, and the range of each of the numeric properties is restricted to xsd:decimal
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Duration description

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Seven properties, :inXSDDate, :inXSDDateTime (deprecated), :inXSDDateTimeStamp, :inXSDgYear, :inXSDgYearMonth, :inTimePosition, and :inDateTime provide alternative ways to describe the temporal position of an :Instant.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Time instant

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A temporal entity with non-zero extent or duration, i.e. for which the value of the beginning and end are different
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Proper interval

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The vCard class is equivalent to the new Kind class, which is the parent for the four explicit types of vCards (Individual, Organization, Location, Group)
owl:Class.rdfs:label: VCard

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A person.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Person

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Describes any revelant information regarding the accessibility of a location of a request.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Accessibility

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The location is accessible by public transport.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Accessible by Public Transport

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Skills to provide particular services which requires some sort of education or training.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Advice

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A collection of allergies, which is caused by hypersensitivity of the immune system.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Allergy

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The skill to assemble items like furniture and other things.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Assembling

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The skill to repair automobiles.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Automobile Repair

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The skill to assist with baking.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Baking

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The skill to do carpenting.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Carpenting

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The skill to assist with catering requirements.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Catering

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The skill to provide care for children.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Child Care

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The skill to assist with general cleaning tasks.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Cleaning

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The person has difficulty in climbing up stairs.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Difficulty in Climbing Stairs

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The skill to assist with washing clothes.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Clothes Washing

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A person with cognitive impairment can't think and remember things clearly.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Cognitive Impairment

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A collection of diseases that are common, especially for elderly people
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Common Disease

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The skill to assist with processing data computers.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Computer Processing

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The skill to fix problems with computers.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Computer Repair

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The skill to assist with cooking in general.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Cooking

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The skill to advice people on psychological matters.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Counseling

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Crafting skills.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Crafting

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The ability to craft any kind of clothes.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Crafting Clothes

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The ability to act as a dancing companion.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Dancing Companion

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A person with depression has a depressed mood over a long period and may even have thoughts of suicide.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Depression

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A disorder characterized by high blood sugar levels during a long period.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Diabetes Mellitus

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The skill to assist with washing dishes.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Dishwashing

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The skill to assist someone with dressing.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Dressing Assistance

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The person has difficulties dressing himself.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Dressing Problems

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Experience in driving cars.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Driving Cars

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Experience in driving heavy vehicles.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Driving Heavy Vehicles

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Experience in driving light vehicles.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Driving Light Vehicles

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Experience in driving tractors.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Driving Tractors

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Experience in driving with trucks.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Driving Trucks

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Experience in driving vans.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Driving Vans

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Experience in driving with trailers.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Driving with Trailers

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An allergy to drugs.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Drug Allergies

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Allergy to egg.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Allergy to Egg

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The skill to provide care and support for the elderly.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Care for Elderly

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Electric outlet available.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Electricity

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The skill to repair electronic devices.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Electronic Repair

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The environment describes relevant factors for matching requesters and helpers which are not described by Skill or Limitation.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Environment

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An allergy to something in the environment such as dust mites, pollen, pet hair and cigarette smoke.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Environmental Allergies

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The skill to assist in planning and hosting events.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Event Planning

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Fear of animals. This can include dogs, cats, snakes, insects, etc.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Fear of Animals

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Fear of cats.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Fear of Cats

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Fear of dark places.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Fear of Dark

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Fear of dogs.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Fear of Dogs

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Fear or phobia of heights.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Fear of Heights

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Specialized in providing assistance with financial services. This can include helping with taxes and book keeping.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Financial Advice

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An allergy to food such as milk, peanuts, eggs, fish, tree nuts, and fruit.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Food Allergies

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The skill to assist with food preparation like meat cutting, washing of food, etc.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Food Preparation

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The skill to provide services related to food products.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Food Service

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The skill to participate in board games, card games, etc.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Games

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Allergies to grains with gluten such as wheat, barley, rye, and oats.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Allergy to Gluten

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The skill to help buying groceries.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Groceries

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Ability to cut someone else's hair.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Hair Cutting

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A condition of diseases that negatively affect one's heart such as blood vessel diseases and heart rhythm problems.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Heart Diseases

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The skill to repair household equipment.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Houseshold Equipment Repair

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The skill to assist someone on hygienical matters.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Hygiene Assitance

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The blood pressure is high in a long period.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Hypertension

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The blood pressure is low in a long period.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Hypotension

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Ingredients (like food) can be provided.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Ingredients

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Internet is available.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Internet

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The skill to assist with inventory management.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Inventory Management

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Specialized in knitting clothes.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Knitting

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Specialized in providing legal assistance.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Legal Advice

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The level can be low, medium, or high.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Level

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Limitations can be anything which prevents or limits the extent to which a user can help somebody else.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Limitation

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The skill to help with maintenance of equipment.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Maintenance

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Disorders that affect the mental states of a person.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Mental Disorder

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The skill to provide care for the mentally ill.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Care Mentally Ill People

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Allergy to milk.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Allergy to Milk

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Difficulties with moving around physically such as having difficulties using toliet, dressing, walking and so on.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Mobility Problems

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The skill to assist with mopping floors, etc.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Mopping

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The skill to assist with mowing the grass.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Mowing

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Allergy to nuts such as almonds, walnuts, pecans, and peanuts.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Allergy to Nuts

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The skill to provide help with office related work.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Office Work

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The skill to assist in buying things online.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Online Shopping

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The skill to provide care for people.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Care for people

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The skill to entertain others by performing music.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Performing Music

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Personal services which include hygiene and daily care.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Personal Services

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The skill to perform phone calls.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Phone Calls

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This is a collection of physical disorders that negatively affect a person's daily life.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Physical Inconvenience

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The skill to provide care for the physically disabled.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Care for Physically Disabled

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Skill to perform plumbing and repairs on pipe installation.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Plumbing

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Having difficulties seeing objects clearly.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Poor Eyesight

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Having difficulties hearing voices clearly.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Poor Hearing

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The skill to assist with pruning shrubs and twigs.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Pruning

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A person with psychotic episode can not tell the difference between the reality and unreality and may have difficulty with social activities in daily life.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Psychotic Episode

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The skill to assist with recording notes and entries.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Recording Notes

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The skill to provide services related to recreation.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Recreation

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The Skill to repair equipment and facilities.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Repair

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A request for help from a Timebank user.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Request

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Diseases that causes chronic pain in joints and muscles such as back, shoulder and neck.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Rheumatism

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The skill to help with selling and buying products.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Sales Services

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Skins are too sensitive to a wide variety of factors such as weather, pets, stress and dust.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Sensitive Skin

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Specialized in sewing clothes.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Sewing

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The skill to provide care for sick people.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Care for Sick People

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Skills define the capabilities of a user. Users and Timebank requests can be associated to a certain skill (or multiple skills) to facilitate the matching of helper and requester.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Skill

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The person needs to be aware of slippery floor.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Splippery Floor

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The person has difficulties speaking clearly due to body function problems such as injuries to the brain, mouth or throat.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Speaking Problems

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Fear of specific objects such as dogs, cats, water, lightning, dark and so on.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Specific Phobia

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The skill to participate in sport activities.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Sports

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The person has to climb stairs to complete the task.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Stairs

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The status of a request.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Status

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: It indicates a person once had a storke. A stroke happens when blood flow to the brain is blocked and oxygen for the brain cells is insufficient, which could leads to cell death.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: History of Strokes

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Availability of specific supplies to complete a task.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Supplies

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Specialized in providing tailoring services.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Tailoring

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The person has difficulties using toilet.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Toilet Using Problems

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Tools can be provided.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Tools

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The skill to provide services related to transportation.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: TransportationServices

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Transportation necessary to complete the task can be provided.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Transportation Available

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The ability to act as a travel companion.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Travel Companion

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The person needs equipment (e.g. shoes) suitable for uneven terrain.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Uneven Terrain

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A user of the Timebank.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: User

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The person has difficulties walking.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Walking Problems

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Water outlet is available.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Watter Supply

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The place is difficult to access during bad weather (e.g. snow).
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Weather Constraint

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The skill to Carve items out of wood.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Wood Carving

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Crafting skill with wood as base material.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Wood Crafting

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The skill to assist with written work, like writing or reading a letter.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Writing

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: Used if a Limitation has a high severity or a Skill is on a high level.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Level: High

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: Used if a Limitation only has a low severity or a Skill is on a low level.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Level: Low

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: Used if a Limitation has a medium severity or a Skill is on a medium level
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Level: Medium

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: Indicates that a request is assigned to a helper but not yet completed.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Status: Assigned

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: Indicates that a request is cancelled and no helper is needed anymore.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Status: Cancelled

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: Indicates that a request is closed and that no helper is needed anymore.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Status: Closed

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: Indicates that a request is open and no helper is assigned to it.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Status: Open
